document_data.mainbody:
Ozomar DoUrden, formerly Ozomar Druugiir, was the house wizard of House DoUrden.
Ozomar was formerly a member of House Druugiir. He attended Sorcere, the drow academy of magic, and was a "promising graduate". After the death of his rival (and the DoUrden house wizard) Nalfein DoUrden, Ozomar happily defected to House DoUrden to serve as house wizard, presumably until its destruction in 1339 DR.
